author: Eyal Wachsman
title: Eliminating VPNs for more secure, productive remote work
description: Businesses around the world have turned to VPNs to work remotely during the pandemic but NoVPN thinks it has a better answer.
content: VPNs were created back in the late 1990s to allow site-to-site connection by virtualizing network access at the TCP/IP level. The primary use-case at the time was to connect various corporate offices into a unified network. Since then, VPNs have grown in popu… [+7451 chars]
